fields.label: Multi SAXS Tool *For Academic Use Only*
Run name
fields.help: results will be placed in a folder named here

fields.label: Input PDB
fields.help: PDB input file for the complex (required).

fields.label: Multi model pdb
fields.help: Choose only if input pdb has multi-frames.

fields.label: Choose all models
fields.help: If unchecked, only first MODEL will be calculated except Pepsi-SAXS

fields.label: Experimental curve
fields.help: Experimental curve (Reference data from experiment or high level theory, required for Fit and Scan mode)

fields.label: Input experimental curve
fields.help: Experimental curve with q, Iq, and error of Iq

fields.label: Angular units
fields.help: Angular units of experimental data. Default is 1/A
fields.values: q = 1/Å, s = 4π sin(θ)/λ~1~q = 1/nm, s = 4π sin(θ)/λ~2~q = 1/Å, s = 2sin(θ)/λ~3~q = 1/nm, s = 2sin(θ)/λ~4

fields.label: Qmin
fields.help: Minimum scattering vector in inverse angstroms. If Qmin is less than the experimental minimum q, Qmin value will be overwritten by the experimental value.

fields.label: Qmax
fields.help: Maximum scattering vector in inverse angstroms (maximum = 1.0 1/A). If Qmax is greater than the experimental maximum q, Qmax value will be overwitten by the experimental value.

fields.label: Number of q points
fields.help: Number of points in the theoretical curve (max = 5000) including q = 0. Automatically modified if an experimental curve exists

fields.label: CRYSOL[1]
fields.help: If unchecked, CRYSOL will be excluded

fields.label: FoXS[1]
fields.help: If unchecked, FoXS will be excluded

fields.label: Pepsi-SAXS[1]
fields.help: If unchecked, Pepsi_SAXS will be excluded

fields.label: SASTBX[1]
fields.help: If unchecked, SASTBX will be excluded

fields.label: Advanced options
fields.help: check to setup advanced options of selected program(s)

fields.label: Use explicit hydrogens [only CRYSOL, FoXS, Pepsi-SAXS, WAXSiS]
fields.help:
Explicit hydrogens for SAXS calculation.
Note WAXSiS always takes into account explicit H atoms regardless of this option.

fields.label: Automatic background subtractions [only CRYSOL, Pepsi-SAXS, WAXSiS]
fields.help:
Automatically substract a constant factor if experimental data contains a systematic error.
For FoXS, put q value using backgrond_q after clicking background subtrations at FoXS specific option.
For WAXSiS,

fields.label: solvent density[Only CRYSOL, WAXSiS]
fields.help: Solvent density (e/Å³). Default value is the electron density of pure water.

fields.label: chain identifier
fields.help: Click to speicify chain(s) in input pdb for calculation

fields.label: chain identifier
fields.help: By default, all chains are processed. If there is _ before chain identifier, all chains except for specified will be processed.

fields.label: contrast of hydration shell (Dro)
fields.help:
Crysol Default: Use values defined by CRYSOL (Calc, Fit, and Scan modes)
Fix Value: Fix to user defined value (Calc, Fit, and Scan modes)
Edit Range: Assign low and high value (Fit and Scan modes Only)
Scan(abs.): Define range of absolute values to perform grid-searching of Χ² (slow)
Scan(ratio): Define a range of values relative to theoretical prediction (slow)

fields.label: value
fields.help: Fix contrast of hydration shell in unit of (e/Å^3)

fields.label: min
fields.help: Minimum of contrast of hydration shell to fit

fields.label: max
fields.help: Maximum of contrast of hydration shell to fit

fields.label: min
fields.help: Minimum of contrast of hydration shell to scan

fields.label: max
fields.help: Maximum of contrast of hydration shell to scan

fields.label: points
fields.help: Number of points to scan greater than 2

fields.label: min
fields.help: Minimum ratio of contrast of hydration shell compared to theoretical prediction

fields.label: max
fields.help: Maximum ratio of contrast of hydration shell compared to theoretical prediction

fields.label: points
fields.help: Number of points to scan greater than 2

fields.label: atomic radius (Ra)
fields.help:
Crysol Default: Use values defined by CRYSOL (Calc, Fit, and Scan modes)
Fix Value: Fix to user defined value (Calc, Fit, and Scan modes)
Edit Range: Assign low and high value (Fit and Scan modes Only)
Scan(abs.): Define range of absolute values to perform grid-searching of Χ² (slow)
Scan(ratio): Define a range of values relative to theoretical prediction (slow)

fields.label: value
fields.help: Fix atomic radius in unit of (Å)

fields.label: min
fields.help: Minimum of atomic radius to fit

fields.label: max
fields.help: Maximum of atomic radius to fit

fields.label: min
fields.help: Minimum of atomic radius to scan

fields.label: max
fields.help: Maximum of atomic radius to scan

fields.label: points
fields.help: Number of points to scan greater than 2

fields.label: min
fields.help: Minimum of atomic radius to scan

fields.label: max
fields.help: Maximum ratio of atomic radius compared to theoretical prediction

fields.label: points
fields.help: Number of points to scan greater than 2

fields.label: excluded volume (Vol)
fields.help:
Crysol Default: Use values defined by CRYSOL (Calc, Fit, and Scan modes)
Fix Value: Fix to user defined value (Calc, Fit, and Scan modes)
Edit Range: Assign low and high value (Fit and Scan modes Only)
Scan(abs.): Define range of absolute values to perform grid-searching of Χ² (slow)
Scan(ratio): Define a range of values relative to theoretical prediction (slow)

fields.label: value
fields.help: Fix excluded volume in unit of (Å^3)

fields.label: min
fields.help: Minimum of excluded volume to fit

fields.label: max
fields.help: Maximum of excluded volume to fit

fields.label: min
fields.help: Minimum of excluded volume to scan

fields.label: max
fields.help: Maximum of excluded volume to scan

fields.label: points
fields.help: Number of points to scan greater than 2

fields.label: min
fields.help: Minimum ratio of excluded volume to scan compared to theoretical prediction

fields.label: max
fields.help: Maximum ratio of excluded volume to scan compared to theroretical prediction

fields.label: points
fields.help: Number of points to scan greater than 2

fields.label: score log
fields.help: use log(intensity) in fitting and scoring

fields.label: coarse grained (CA only)
fields.help: fast coarse grained calculation using CA atoms only

fields.label: background subtractions
fields.help: background adjustment of experimental data, not used by default.

fields.label: log json
fields.help: Output the log file in the JSON format

fields.label: negative contrast
fields.help: Allowing negative contrast of the hydration shell upon fitting

fields.label: fast hydration
fields.help: A coarser representation of the hydration shell

fields.label: set_expansion order
fields.help: Set the expansion order, default is chosen adaptively

fields.label: expansion order
fields.help: Number of coefficients in the expansion

fields.label: set hydration shell contrast
fields.help: Hydration shell contrast (in % of the bulk value), default is 5%

fields.label: hydration shell contrast
fields.help: Hydration shell contrast (in % of the bulk value), default is 5%

fields.label: buffer subtraction
fields.help: Select the buffer subtraction method in theoretical curve
fields.values: Total buffer scattering subtracted~total~Buffer scattering reduced by solute volume~solute_reduced

fields.label: ligands & crystallization agents
fields.help: Select method to treat ligands and crystallization agents in input pdb file
fields.values: Keep ligands, try to remove crystallization agents~remove_cryst_agents~Keep all~keep_all~Remove all~remove_all

fields.label: convergence[link]
fields.help:
Control the number of MD simulation frames to achieve a converged theoretical curve.
Click the link for more info.

fields.label: envelope distance
fields.help: Specify the envelope distance (Å) from 3 to 8.

fields.label: random seed
fields.help:
Use new random seed for initial velocities?
Yes(Results vary slightly)
No(Results are reproducible)
